import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import './portfolio.css' import {db} from '../../services/firebase' const CollectPayouts = (props) => { //props const user = props.user //states const [payouts, setPayouts] = useState([]) const [total, setTotal] = useState(0) //Functionality const getUncollectedPayouts = () => { if(user.email){ const payouts1 = [] let holder = 0 db.collection('Payouts').where('payoutUser', '==', user.email).where('collected', '==', false).get().then(snapshot => { snapshot.forEach(doc => { const data = doc.data() payouts1.push(data) holder = holder + data.payoutAmount }) console.log('payouts') console.log(payouts1) setPayouts(payouts1) }) } } useEffect(() => { getUncollectedPayouts() }, [user]) const collectPayouts = () => { alert(`collected`) return props.hide } return(
Collect Win Payouts
( {payouts.length} )

sim{p.share.substring(0, p.share.length - 4)} {`${p.date.substring(4, 6)}/${p.date.substring(6, 8)}/${p.date.substring(2, 4)}`}
${p.payoutAmount.toFixed(2)}
) })}
